name: local-plugins
description: Custom local plugins with isolated MCP access

plugins.name: airtable-manager
plugins.description: Airtable database operations with isolated MCP access

plugins.name: outlook-email-manager
plugins.description: Personal Outlook/MS365 email and calendar operations

plugins.name: inflow-inventory-manager
plugins.description: inFlow Inventory stock management and operations

plugins.name: clickup-task-manager
plugins.description: ClickUp task management and sprint tracking

plugins.name: github-manager
plugins.description: GitHub repository, issue, and PR management via gh CLI

plugins.name: google-workspace-manager
plugins.description: Business Google Workspace (Gmail, Calendar, Drive, Docs, Sheets, Rich Text, Comments, Suggestions)

plugins.name: google-analytics-manager
plugins.description: Google Analytics 4, Search Console, and Merchant Center analytics

plugins.name: notion-workspace-manager
plugins.description: Notion workspace documentation and SOPs

plugins.name: shopify-order-manager
plugins.description: Shopify e-commerce operations (orders, customers, products)

plugins.name: web-search-manager
plugins.description: Web search via Brave Search API

plugins.name: slack-manager
plugins.description: Slack workspace operations (channels, messages, users)

plugins.name: make-scenario-manager
plugins.description: Trigger Make.com On-Demand scenarios (only On-Demand scheduled scenarios are exposed)

plugins.name: klaviyo-marketing-manager
plugins.description: Klaviyo email marketing (campaigns, flows, segments, profiles)

plugins.name: zapier-automation-manager
plugins.description: Zapier actions + Zap management via browser automation

plugins.name: gorgias-support-manager
plugins.description: Gorgias helpdesk operations (tickets, customers, messages)

plugins.name: judgeme-review-manager
plugins.description: Judge.me product reviews and ratings management

plugins.name: xero-accounting-manager
plugins.description: Xero accounting operations via direct API (invoices, contacts, payments, reports, quotes, and more)

plugins.name: freightos-shipment-manager
plugins.description: Freightos freight quotes (API) and booking/tracking (browser)

plugins.name: ups-collection-manager
plugins.description: UPS collection booking via CLI-based browser automation (zero context overhead)

plugins.name: royalmail-label-manager
plugins.description: Royal Mail Click & Drop shipping labels via browser automation

plugins.name: easypost-shipping-manager
plugins.description: Create UPS shipping labels via EasyPost API with Shopify integration

plugins.name: aftership-tracking-manager
plugins.description: AfterShip shipment tracking (query, monitor, retrack)

plugins.name: shipsgo-container-tracker
plugins.description: ShipsGo ocean container tracking (API v2) - BL/container/booking tracking, ETA monitoring, vessel positions

plugins.name: retently-feedback-manager
plugins.description: Retently NPS/CSAT feedback operations (customers, responses, scores, campaigns)

plugins.name: betting-markets-manager
plugins.description: Search and aggregate prediction markets (Polymarket, Kalshi, Betfair) with unified odds and volume

plugins.name: clarity-fm-manager
plugins.description: Find and book expert calls on Clarity.fm via CLI-based browser automation (zero context overhead)

plugins.name: uk-transport-manager
plugins.description: UK train departures, timetables, journey planning with connections, and booking links via TransportAPI + Google Routes API

plugins.name: italki-manager
plugins.description: italki Mandarin Chinese teacher search, indexing, and lesson booking via hybrid HTTP API + browser automation
